<h2>About My Research</h2>
<div class="about-grid">
<div class="about-text">
<p class="lead">I am interested in studying proteins involved in bacterial signaling pathways.</p>
<p>Currently, I am a graduate student co-advised by <strong>Jean-Paul Armache</strong> and <strong>Katsuhiko Murakami</strong> in the Department of Biochemistry & Molecular Biology at Pennsylvania State University. My research focuses on <strong>Cryo-EM data processing</strong>, <strong>experimental design</strong>, <strong>methodology development</strong>, <strong>protein purification</strong>, and <strong>structural characterization</strong>.</p>
<p>My work combines cutting-edge structural biology techniques with computational approaches to understand fundamental mechanisms in bacterial systems.</p>
</div>
